body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Gardner. Father of Martha A. Gardner, Thomas Gardner, Mary E. Gardner, Sinclair Gardner, Lucinda J. Gardner, Alfred Gardner, Elizabeth P. Gardner, Matilda J. Gardner, Charlotte Gardner, Mahala A. Gardner, and Celia Gardner.
